mapper.select: select from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED ORDER by INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED ORDER by INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED

select * from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED where INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM = (select max(INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM) from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED where INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM<(select INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED where INTEGRATED_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED where INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM = (select min(INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM) from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED where INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM>(select INTEGRATED_ORDER_NUM from TBUILD_FLOW_INTEGRATED where INTEGRATED_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
